courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Credit is not given for both CS 493 and a project course in another engineering department for the same project. Prerequisite: CS 492.
description: Continuation of CS 492. Identical to CS 494 except for an additional writing component. See CS 494. 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Credit is not given for both CS 493 and a project course in another engineering department for the same project. Prerequisite: CS 492.
label: Senior Project II, ACP
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Computer Science major(s). Restricted to students with Senior class standing. Restricted to Undergrad - Urbana-Champaign.
